Made for the toughest of plumbing jobs, the RIDGID 31040 Model 48 Heavy-Duty Straight 48-Inch Pipe Wrench is a plumbing wrench that boasts sturdy ductile-iron housing and an I-beam handle for maximum strength and leverage. It has a quickly adjustable full-floating forged hook jaw featuring self-cleaning threads and easily replaceable spring assembly, hook jaw and heel jaw. The rugged non-stick adjustment nut cleans grime from the hook jaw shank for dependable tool use.

Designed for convenience, the plumbing wrench comes in a standout red color that is easy to locate in your toolbox. A versatile plumbing tool, the 48-inch straight pipe wrench is ideal for pipe diameters of 3 inch to 5 inch with a capacity of up to 6 inches, and is suitable for all types of pipe work.
RIDGID covers its products with a lifetime warranty against defects in material or workmanship for the life of the tool.

Since 1923, RIDGID has remained the symbol of certainty to dedicated professionals of the expert trades. Every tool that bears the RIDGID brand is engineered to the same high standards of quality, strength and endurance, as was that first heavy-duty pipe wrench more than 80 years ago.

Straight Handle Pipe Wrench. Sturdy housing and I-beam handle with full floating hook jaw, non-stick adjustment nut and replaceable hook and heel jaws. Rugged, easy-spin, nonstick adjustment nut that automatically cleans grime from hook jaw shank. Pipe capacity: 6 in. Weight: 34-1/4 lbs.
